alert.note: Alert for Chiricahua Mountains including Chiricahua National Monument; Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 22 at 1:55AM MST until March 22 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Mountain ranges of Cochise County including the Chiricahua, Dragoon, Mule and Huachuca Mountains. * WHEN...In effect through 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained winds of 35 mph or greater above 5000 feet are expected. Higher gusts are also likely. Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Chiricahua Mountains including Chiricahua National Monument; Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon
